info.name: snahp.it Dark Mode
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.5
2021-05-06
Tested on Firefox.
Changelog:
- Fixed white background on certain media page text boxes.


Version 1.0.4
2020-09-11
Tested on Firefox.
Changelog:
- Themed a new kind of infobox.
- Themed search bar.
- Resized selectors for featured links to be more clickable.


Version 1.0.3
2019-01-04
Tested on Chrome and Firefox.
Changelog:
- Fixed some text getting darker on hover instead of getting lighter.
